name: Fallwords
description:
A new and unique word game where you drag letter tiles around the board to swap them and build words.  How many words can you create at once by dragging a single tile?   Each level has a different set of tiles.  Eliminate the tiles by creating words.  Then new letters tiles will fall in from above.   A level ends when all the tiles are gone, or no possible words remain.  The more words you create in one go, the higher the score multiplier will be.  Longer words are also worth extra points.  Once tiles start running out, you will be allowed to make 3 letter words.  (Certain levels allow 3 letter words from the beginning)

I'm using itch.io as a sort of open beta for this game.  Look for it on Google Play and the App Store in the future.

Currently only the Android version is available.

Check back for regular updates.
